sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Grid,
  Typography,
  Box,
  Accordion,
  AccordionSummary,
  AccordionDetails,
} from '@mui/material';
import ExpandMoreIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ExpandMore';

const StatBox = ({ label, value, unit = '' }) => (
  <Box
    sx={{
      p: 2,
      borderRadius: 2,
      bgcolor: 'background.paper',
      boxShadow: 1,
      textAlign: 'center',
    }}
  >
    <Typography variant="h4" color="primary" gutterBottom>
      {value}
      {unit}
    </Typography>
    <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
      {label}
    </Typography>
  </Box>
);

const PlayerStats = ({ stats }) => {
  const { basicStats, detailedStats } = stats;

  return (
    <Box>
      <Grid container spacing={3} mb={3}>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <StatBox
            label="Points per Game"
            value={basicStats.pointsPerGame}
          />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <StatBox
            label="Rebounds per Game"
            value={basicStats.reboundsPerGame}
          />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <StatBox
            label="Assists per Game"
            value={basicStats.assistsPerGame}
          />
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

      <Grid container spacing={3} mb={3}>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <StatBox
            label="Field Goal %"
            value={basicStats.fieldGoalPercentage}
            unit="%"
          />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <StatBox
            label="3-Point %"
            value={basicStats.threePointPercentage}
            unit="%"
          />
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
          <StatBox
            label="Free Throw %"
            value={basicStats.freeThrowPercentage}
            unit="%"
          />
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

      <Accordion>
        <AccordionSummary expandIcon={<ExpandMoreIcon />}>
          <Typography variant="h6">Detailed Statistics</Typography>
        </AccordionSummary>
        <AccordionDetails>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Games Played</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.gamesPlayed}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Minutes per Game</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.minutesPerGame}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Field Goals per Game</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.fieldGoalsPerGame}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Field Goal Attempts</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.fieldGoalAttempts}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">3-Pointers per Game</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.threePointersPerGame}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">3-Point Attempts</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.threePointAttempts}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Free Throws per Game</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.freeThrowsPerGame}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Free Throw Attempts</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.freeThrowAttempts}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Offensive Rebounds</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.offensiveRebounds}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Defensive Rebounds</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.defensiveRebounds}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Steals per Game</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.stealsPerGame}</Typography>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2">Blocks per Game</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body1">{detailedStats.blocksPerGame}</Typography>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </AccordionDetails>
      </Accordion>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default PlayerStats;
